Name: Semantic Divider
Description: A divider visually segments content into separate groups

Definitions.Vertical Divider: A divider can segment content vertically
Definitions.Horizontal Divider: A divider can segment content horizontally
Definitions.Icon Divider: A divider can include an icon
Definitions.Inverted: A divider can have its colors inverted
Definitions.Fitted: A divider can be fitted, without any space above or below it.
Definitions.Section: A divider can provide greater margins to divide sections of content
Definitions.Clearing: A divider can clear the contents above it
